#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#define MAXN 1000010

char str[MAXN+10];
char resp[MAXN+10];

int main()
{
	int N, K;
	int q[3] = {}, tam;
	scanf("%d %d", &N, &K);
	getchar();
	gets(str);
	for ( int i = 0; i < K; i++ ) {
		for ( int k = 0; k < 3; k++ )
			q[k] = 0;
		for ( int k = i; k < N; k += K ) {
			q[str[k]-'a']++; 
		}
		char idx = 0;
		if ( q[idx] < q[1] )
			idx = 1;
		if ( q[idx] < q[2] )
			idx = 2;
		idx += 'a';
		resp[i] = idx;
	}
	resp[K] = '\0';
	printf("%s\n", resp);
	return 0;
}
